alert.note: Alert for Gibson (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 07 at 11:43AM EST until March 13 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana... Patoka River near Princeton affecting Gibson County. For the Patoka River...including Princeton...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Patoka River near Princeton. * WHEN...Until early Monday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM CST Tuesday the stage was 16.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Thursday morning to a crest of 18.3 feet early Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
